column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Trang - Thank you for your feedback. If you have any issues with your food
column2: please let your server know and he or she will do everything within our power to make sure you enjoy our food. Otherwise we will gladly remove it from your tab. We live and die by our motto: "If it's not great
column3: remake." More specifically to your review
column4: we can always add "Less Salt" to your order if that's your preference. Thank you for your time.
